definitions.definition: An annual plant ( Cicer arietinum ) in the pea family , widely cultivated for the edible seeds in its short inflated pods .
A seed of this plant, often used as a food .
examples: Chickpea is valued for its nutritive seeds with high protein content.

main_definition: An annual plant ( Cicer arietinum ) in the pea family , widely cultivated for the edible seeds in its short inflated pods .
secondary_definitions: A seed of this plant, often used as a food .
